product.composition: Top notes: pomegranate, yuzu iced accord; middle notes: magnolia, lotus flower, peony; base notes: vegetal amber, acajou, musk.

story.inspiration: A fruity, floral and musky scent inspired by a mixture of Donatella Versace's favorite floral fragrances.

comments: This is a long time love for me. It’s a sexy scent that is extremely wearable and feminine. I haven’t smelled anything that mimics it’s eye rolling lovely aroma.
It's a beautiful scent for summer time. I am always enjoying of wearing it. It's very uplifting, sparkling, sweet and flowery.
